channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: This powerful wireless hi-fi speaker has all the modern connections you could want — and a touchscreen to control things easily
item.description: The Primare Allt-i-Ett is a jack of all trades, and perhaps a master of them too, with basically every spec you'd ever want.

item.title: Adobe Animate is shutting down as company focuses on AI - although business years get a slight stay of execution
item.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued from March 1, 2026, with Creative Cloud Pro apps picking up the pieces.

item.title: Perquisition chez X en France : le parquet de Paris convoque Elon Musk
item.description: Le parquet de Paris a réquisitionné ce mardi les locaux français de X (anciennement Twitter), dans le cadre d'une enquête faisant suite à des signalements remontant à janvier 2025. En parallèle, une convocation a été envoyée à Elon Musk, à des fins d'audition libre.

item.title: Save on the Disney+ and Hulu bundle: Get one month for only $10
item.description: The peak time for deals on streaming services — the holiday shopping season — has come and gone, but Disney is back with a fresh offer for the new year. New and eligible returning subscribers can get one month of the ad-supported Disney+ Hulu bundle for just $10. That's $3 off the usual monthly rate for the bundle, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the prices for each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't quite as good as the Black Friday deal we saw last year, which offered th...

item.title: Coup double pour B&You avec ce forfait mobile 100 Go pas cher et un Giga jackpot de 100 000 euros à gagner [Sponso]
item.description: B&You démarre l’année 2026 en force avec son offre combinée mobile + fibre qui revient au total à 31,98 euros par mois, sans engagement. Voici tout ce qu’elle comprend pour un tarif aussi contenu.

item.title: Joue-la comme Nvidia : le prix des GPUs AMD Radeon flamberait de nouveau… et très bientôt
item.description: Les partenaires AIB d'AMD nous concocteraient une nouvelle hausse de prix sur leurs cartes graphiques Radeon. Cette révision tarifaire se concrétiserait dès ce premier trimestre 2026.

item.title: On vous dit tout sur OpenClaw, la nouvelle IA autonome dont tout le monde parle
item.description: OpenClaw, c'est le nom du nouvel agent IA qui fait le buzz sur Internet. Très populaire auprès des développeurs, il est capable de contrôler tout votre ordinateur à votre place. On vous dit tout ce qu'il faut savoir sur le projet, de ses possibilités à ses dérives.

item.title: One of ‘Star Wars’ Biggest Recent Reveals Was Inspired by ‘Lord of the Rings’
item.description: The introduction of Darth Plagueis in 'The Acolyte' was meant to be like Gollum.

item.title: A Continuous Glucose Monitor Might Help You Lose Weight (2026)
item.description: Signos is the first FDA-cleared, AI-enabled system that uses CGMs to nudge you towards healthier behaviors.

item.title: Aluminium: Why Google’s Android for PC launch may be messy and controversial
item.description: "Finally." That was my first reaction when I heard Google would combine Android and ChromeOS into a single operating system. Android has long struggled on tablets, and ChromeOS always felt like too much of a stripped-down alternative to tempt me away from Windows and Mac. So last week, it was exciting to see a leaked […]

item.title: Is your calendar a mess? This app solved my schedule woes on all my devices
item.description: Fantastical is a cross-platform calendar app that’s stuffed with features. Here’s why I love it.

item.title: YouTube now blocking background playback on mobile browsers
item.description: YouTube has started to block third-party mobile browsers from using a background playback loophole. Background playback is supposed to be limited to YouTube Premium subscribers through the official iOS or Android app, but many people have been using browsers like Brave, Vivaldi, and Edge to get background playback without a subscription. Not anymore. "Background playback […]...

item.title: India’s Supreme Court to WhatsApp: ‘You cannot play with the right to privacy’
item.description: India's top court is investigating WhatsApp’s data-sharing model, monopoly power, and user consent.

item.title: YouTube has annoyed free users once again by cracking down on this popular background playback hack
item.description: Free YouTube users have noticed that background viewing has stopped for third-party mobile browsers, and no one is happy about it.

item.title: OpenAI reveals Codex app for Mac - 'a different kind of tool' it says is a much easier way to deploy AI agents on Apple devices
item.description: OpenAI has packaged Codex into a user-friendly macOS app, and it's doubling rate limits for most paid subscribers to celebrate.

item.title: Koala Wanda Sofa Bed Review: Compact Comfort
item.description: This sleeper sofa comprises a reversible chaise, sofa, daybed, and queen-size bed—I slept on it for a week to see if it’s good for guests.

item.title: Sony imagine une nouvelle manette révolutionnaie sans aucun bouton physique et qui prévoit vos actions
item.description: Sony vient de voir un de ses brevets validés pour une manette à écran tactile sans le moindre bouton. De quoi offrir une modularité exemplaire aux joueurs.

item.description: The next update for Windows 11 arrives on February 10 with a number of new features.

item.title: The Model S changed everything
item.description: The Tesla Model S is at the end of its illustrious 14-year run - and what a dizzying ride it's been. In 2012, when Tesla made its first Model S deliveries to customers, Facebook acquired Instagram. Apple launched the iPhone 5 and iOS 6. Barack Obama sailed into his second term. Superstorm Sandy shredded New […]

item.title: Proton VPN two-year subscriptions are 70 percent off right now
item.description: Proton VPN is running a solid deal right now, dropping its two-year Proton VPN Plus plan to $2.99 per month. That works out to $72 billed upfront for the first 24 months, which represents a 70 percent discount compared to its regular pricing. We’ve rated Proton VPN highly thanks to its strong privacy credentials, transparent nonprofit backing and consistently fast performance. It’s one of the services we recommend in our guide to the best VPNs, and this deal also shows up alongside other standout offers in our ongoing roundup of the best VPN deals. It’s a good option if you’re looking to lock ...

item.title: Sony patents AI-generated podcasts with PlayStation characters because 'video game platforms currently lack the ability to provide unique and targeted content to gamers'
item.description: Sony has reportedly acquired a new patent for AI-generated podcasts that would feature AI-voiced PlayStation characters.

item.title: Huge iPhone Fold leak teases specs and design – here are 7 ways it could differ from the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7
item.description: The iPhone Fold could have some advantages over the Galaxy Z Fold 7, but it might also have some disadvantages, according to the latest leak.

item.title: Vous utilisez Mail Orange ? Votre boîte mail va radicalement changer
item.description: Orange s’apprête à lancer une refonte importante de la version web de sa messagerie pour moderniser l'expérience de votre boîte mail en 2026.

item.title: Ce casque sans fil conçu pour la Xbox et compatible Dolby Atmos passe enfin sous la barre des 90 €
item.description: Entre son autonomie de 20 heures et sa compatibilité avec le Dolby Atmos, ce casque sans fil conçu pour la Xbox pourra vous garantir de longues sessions de jeu dans les meilleures conditions. Vous pourrez le retrouver pour 86,27 euros chez PC Componentes au lieu de 109,99 euros.

item.title: Vema predicts cheap hydrogen could change where data centers are built
item.description: Vema Hydrogen drills wells to stimulate hydrogen production deep underground, which could result in some of the cheapest hydrogen available.

item.title: The Morning After: Elon Musk’s SpaceX is buying his AI company, xAI
item.description: Like some sort of corporate Russian doll, SpaceX has announced its acquisition of xAI. The merger will “form the most ambitious, vertically integrated innovation engine on (and off) Earth,” according to, well, owner Elon Musk. The AI company, arguably best known for its ongoing CSAM-generating chatbot controversy, might seem like a strange fit for a rocket company. But SpaceX is apparently key to Musk’s latest scheme to build AI data centers in space. There might be an argument for moving the resource-intensive operations to space — but Musk continued.He also claimed space-based data centers w...

item.title: Seth Meyers has a blunt response to Elon Musks email to Epstein
item.description: Seth Meyers has responded to the latest batch of Epstein files, which include emails from Elon Musk to the late sex offender.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX acquires Elon Musks xAI, including social media platform X
item.description: SpaceX has acquired xAI, which includes the chatbot Grok. Both companies were already controlled by Elon Musk.

Known for its privacy features and end-to-end encryption, the Signal messaging app has become a popular platform for organizing these community groups. Signal can be a great tool […]

item.title: Compte à rebours stoppé pour Artemis II : ce qui s’est passé… et ce qui pourrait tout retarder
item.description: C’était à craindre : suite à la répétition générale du lancement qui s’est tenue ces derniers jours, la Nasa annonce que la mission Artemis II pourrait être reportée au mois de mars. Plusieurs fuites et anomalies techniques ont en effet été détectées lors des tests.

item.title: Tesla lance un Model Y 4×4 à prix cassé : pourquoi vous ne le verrez sans doute jamais en France
item.description: Tesla dégaine une nouvelle version de son best-seller outre-Atlantique. Un Model Y "Standard" mais en transmission intégrale, qui en dit long sur la capacité d'adaptation (ou d'improvisation) de la firme d'Elon Musk.

item.description: Le Samsung Galaxy S24 FE Entreprise Edition est similaire au modèle classique, avec quelques fonctions logicielles supplémentaires. On le trouve aujourd'hui à 399 euros au lieu de 749 euros au lancement.

item.title: AI in healthcare is entering a new era of accountability
item.description: Hospitals want AI they can trust. And proof now matters more than promise. Almost 10 years ago, physician and data scientist Dr. Ruben Amarasingham founded Pieces Technologies in Dallas with a clear goal: use artificial intelligence to make clinical work lighter, not heavier. At a time when much of healthcare AI focused on prediction and automation, Pieces concentrated on something harder to quantify but more consequential—how clinicians actually think, document, and make decisions inside busy hospital workflows....

item.title: Culture isn’t what you say, it’s what you do
item.description: When it comes to setting the a tone for your organization, actions speak louder than words. I’ve read a lot of books on building a culture at work. A lot of the advice is well intentioned but to me overly complex. A 20-step framework is a lot harder to live by than a simple operating principle. Culture is something people feel and live more than implement. ...

item.title: The row house is back to solve the housing crisis
item.description: The American Housing Corp. is turning the classic row house into a factory-built kit of parts. Its goal? Faster, cheaper construction in the most expensive cities. At a factory in Austin, a startup recently finished its first prototype: a row house it plans to replicate in cities nationwide to help with the housing shortage.

item.title: Ikea dévoile une enceinte pour enfants à 15 euros en forme de souris
item.description: Après la Kallsup, sa petite enceinte Bluetooth à 5 euros, Ikea continue d’investir dans l’audio avec un nouveau modèle d’entrée de gamme. Destinée aux enfants, la Grejsimojs mise sur un design ludique en forme de souris, une conception résistante et un prix toujours très accessible de 14,99 euros.

item.title: Ce journaliste a rechargé une voiture électrique en 3 minutes : voici comment il y est arrivé
item.description: La startup britannique Nyobolt continue le développement de sa batterie à la recharge ultra-rapide. Installée sur une voiture électrique expérimentale, elle peut passer de 30 à 80 % en 3 minutes seulement – aussi vite qu'un plein d'essence. L'arrivée est prévue en série avant 2030.

item.title: Notepad++ hit by suspected Chinese state-sponsored hackers - here's what we know so far
item.description: Notepad++ targeted and used to deliver poisoned updates to a select group of victims.

item.title: After entering administration last month, Frasers Group-owned UK retailer Game is officially closing the rest of its standalone stores
item.description: Long-running UK retailer Game is officially closing the last of its standalone stores, after entering administration last month. It's also confirmed that managing director Nick Arran is exiting the company after nine years.

item.title: Act fast to score $90 off our favorite Samsung smartwatch right now at Amazon
item.description: As of Feb. 3, the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 (40mm) has dropped to $259.99 at Amazon, 26% off its list price of $349.99.

item.title: Plus que quelques heures pour profiter des 10 meilleures offres chez Carrefour

item.title: Panneaux solaires chinois : aucune preuve d’espionnage, mais une faille de sécurité persiste
item.description: Les onduleurs des panneaux solairs chinois ne seraient-ils finalement pas si risqués ? Selon une recherche menée par les Américains, il n’existe aucune preuve que ces équipements aient été utilisés pour espionner ou perturber le réseau. Néanmoins, ces appareils présentent certaines vulnérabilités qui pourraient être exploitées pour affecter les systèmes électriques. ...
